resources.string:
Kindly follow the instructions given below for smooth functionality. 

1. Switch on your mobile bluetooth. 

2. Scan for device name mentioned in the card provided. 

3. The MAC Address given in the card is the password for your health device. 

4. Pair the devices and start accessing the app. 

Note: 

1. The device must be connected to internet for uploading your health data to server every 30 seconds. 

2. The device bluetooth must be switched on for receiving data from your health device. 


Wishing you good health and happiness in life!
